actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The annis makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Crushing Hug
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 36 (9d6 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target takes 36 (9d6 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the hag's turns. The hag can't make attacks while grappling a creature in this way.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). She can innately cast the following spells:
